alert.note: Alert for Butler; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:07AM CDT until June 10 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM CDT FOR WESTERN COWLEY...SOUTHERN SEDGWICK...SOUTHWESTERN BUTLER AND SUMNER COUNTIES... At 307 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Conway Springs to near Udall, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Derby, Arkansas City, Winfield, Haysville, Wellington, Mulvane, Rose Hill, Clearwater, Douglass, Belle Plaine, Conway Springs, Caldwell, Oxford, Udall, Argonia, South Haven, Geuda Springs, Viola, Rock and Mayfield. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
